content.rendered:
Directed by ALi Khan AK. Sharan Sharma

Written by Sharan Sharma. Hussain Dalal. ALi Khan AK. Writer Bhaiya

Cast Janhvi Kapoor (Gunjan Saxena). Pankaj Tripathi (Colonel Anup Saxena). Angad Bedi (Anshuman Saxena). Manav Vij (Commanding Officer Gautam Sinha). Ayesha Raza Mishra (Kirti Saxena). Vineet Kumar Singh (Flight Commander Dileep Singh). Chandan Anand (Chief Instructor Ashish Ahuja (IAFA)). Gautam Singh (Self Defence Instructor). Mannu Malik (IAFA Instructor). Kapil Tilhari (SSB Officer Mishra). Maneesh Verma (SSB Officer Sameer Mehra (as Manish Verma)). Sadhna Bajpai (SSB Lady Medical Officer (as Dr. Sadhna Bajpai)). Barbie Rajput (Mannu). Virendra Singh (Subedar Dayal). Raunak Bhinder (Soldier Biswa (as Raunak Binder)). Akkshay Gunaawat (Soldier Revtiraman (as Akshay Gunawat)). Bhupesh Rai (Major Navjot Kaul (as Bhupesh Ray)). Gulshan Pandey (Chief Operating Officer (Srinagar Air Force Station)). Varun Rastogi (ATC Officer (Srinagar Base)). Shushmit Bahuguna (Pilot Mohit). Ashish Bhatt (Pilot Veeru). Akash Dhar (Pilot Shekhar). Tejdeep Gill (Pilot Harry). Dishant Guliya (Pilot Sandhu). Rachit Hooda (Pilot Asif). Yogendra Singh (Pilot Montu). Riva Arora (Young Gunjan). Aryan Arora (Young Anshuman). Shashie Vermaa (Khanna Uncle (as Shashie Verma)). Poonam Labana (Seema Khanna (as Poonam Lobana)). Aarav Shukla (Daboo). Maria Srishti Marcelline (Air Hostess (as Maria Shrishti)). Abhiroy Singh (Pilot). Nadeem (Co-Pilot). Som Ganguly (Adjutant Officer). Mohit K. Mehta (Officer in Room (as Mohit Mehta)). Rajesh Balwani (Clerk (Delhi Flying School)). Akanksha Kathi (Candidate 1). Kritika Buden (Candidate 2). Sudha (Candidate 3). Oshi Sahu (Candidate 4). Akanksha Pandey (Candidate 5). Muskaan (Candidate 6). Swati (Candidate 7). Aditi Gangwar (Candidate 8). Zura Gelashvili (Pakistani Commander). Anuj Mishra (Air Man 1). Anurag Sharma (Air Man 2). Jairoop Jeevan (Politician). Omi Tiwari (News Reporter (On Field)). Suraj Kumar (Non Combatant (Udhampur Base)). Hariom Anant (Non Combatant). Keshav Mittal (Mess Boy). Tanush (Kid Dancing). Rachit Agarwal (Yash).Vicky Ahuja. ALi Khan Ak (ALi Khan AK). Abhi Brar (Sikh Officer). Gurii (Bawa). Sharik Khan (Sharik Khan). Mukesh Marko (Zafar (voice)). Al Yasaha Naim (Al Yasaha Naim). Vishal Meena Phagi (Vishal). Mox Rathore (Mox). Mrinal Roy (Army). Gurnaaz Mittu ((uncredited)). Rachana Parulkar ((uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers ALi Khan AK. Gopal Babel. Parth Dholakia. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Hetvi Karia. Sumit Khurana. Apoorva Mehta. Somen Mishra. Natia Nikoleishvili. Shariq Patel. Arun Singh

Production Dharma Production. Flying Picture
